long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Regex: The ultimate Regex search ⭐️
Simply use Regex on any page with familiar Ctrl+F visuals. 

✓ Ctrl+Shift+F search field   
✓  Regex query searching
✓ Number of results per tab   ✓ Scroll screen to previous/next result   ✓ Highlighting search results

 ✓ Permanently marking up or replacing anything.

 Open Source!    https://github.com/code-for-charity (where we work hard daily.) 
 Please check out the source code & contribute 🎈

The Extension runs offline
long.ru:
The Regex Search. Simply use Regex on any page with familiar Ctrl+F visuals. Works with all websites!👌

Features:
 ✓ Ctrl+Shift+F search field
 ✓ Regex query searching
 ✓ Highlighting search results
 ✓ Scroll screen to previous/next result
 ✓ Number of results per tab

Open Source! 🎈 Check out Frame By Frame's source code and contribute here:
   •  https://github.com/victor-savinov/regex-search

Permissions explained:
  ⭐️ "Read and change all your data on the websites you visit": to be able to connect to and search query on any website.
